text: Hagi Moapu vahe'mo'za Ra Anumzamofona veganokano hunente'za, zamavufaga erisga hu'naze. Ana hu'negu ha' vahe'mo'za eme zamazeri haviza hanage'za, aka ti ne'naza vahe'mo'za neginagi nehu'za, zamagra'a amuti trazampi mase'za rukrahekrehe nehazaza hugahaze. Ana nehanage'za vahe'mo'za nezamage'za tusi zamagizaregahaze.
